meta.content: Front Page; New York and Region
meta.name: online_sections

block.p: Census Participation Rises A higher percentage of households completed and returned census forms this year than in 1990, reversing 30 years of declining participation in the count.
Drug Ads Spur Spending Advertising to consumers has stimulated a major increase in retail spending on prescription drugs, the fastest-growing item in the nation's health care budget.
Census Participation Rises A higher percentage of households completed and returned census forms this year than in 1990, reversing 30 years of declining participation in the count.
Drug Ads Spur Spending Advertising to consumers has stimulated a major increase in retail spending on prescription drugs, the fastest-growing item in the nation's health care budget.
Milosevic's Anti-NATO Race In his race for re-election, President Slobodan Milosevic of Yugoslavia is running not against his democratic opposition, but against NATO and the United States.
